name: MEC Khione Insulated Jacket - Women's
description:
Warmer than the previous Khione, this insulated waterproof layer is great if snow riding is your go-to winter sport. Technical features include updated warmer insulation throughout, fully taped seams, zippered underarm vents and a helmet compatible hood.2-layer polyester with a waterproof-breathable PU laminate, and DWR finish.Fully taped seams seal out water.Recycled polyester lining features a DWR finish.Insulated with 180g insulation in the body, 160g in the sleevesFront zip with a fleeced chin guard.Water-resistant outer zippersInternal pockets for phone or goggles.Powder skirt with gripper elastic and loop for attaching compatible snow pants.Adjustable drawcord at the hem.Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue to detect and locate Recco reflectors under snow.

        Sustainability
